title: Sonyâ€™s new Xperia I IV brings a 4K 120Hz display, improved zoom lens, and a large battery
content:
Sony has long given up on the idea of competing against big smartphone OEMs in every market at every possible price bracket. Instead of trying to appeal to mainstream buyers, the company has embraced its identity as a niche player and seems content with catering to a small but dedicated audience. The company’s Xperia 1

The post Sony’s new Xperia I IV brings a 4K 120Hz display, improved zoom lens, and a large battery appeared first on XDA.
description: Sony's new Xperia I IV is here, packing a 4K OLED 120Hz display, Snapdrgon 8 Gen 1 chipset, flagship cameras, and other incremental improvements.
